Text: FW Increased Security at Enron CenterOriginal Message From Enron NRON On Behalf Of Corporate NRON Sent Friday October AM To All Enron NRON Subject Increased Security at Enron Center Late on October th we received information about a nonspecific threat to the Enron Center We communicated with law enforcement officials who found the threat unsubstantiated and without merit Nonetheless we take all threats seriously and have increased the security presence at the Enron Center still further Once again if you observe suspicious behavior please call security at
